name: Elementris (Mascara Drone)
description:
Elementris is like Tetris, but the element of color finally got a meaning

  • Place up to 20 different shapes of 4 different colors on the grid without a gap
  • Shapes can be anything from dominoes to pentominoes, depending on your skill
  • Tiles of the same color don't go together
  • Amend your mistakes with helpful specials like the Eraser, the Hammer and the Colorizer
  • Hone your skills in 2 different game modes as the game gets faster and faster
  • BETA Version: If you encounter bugs or unexpected behavior, please leave a comment or send us an email (mascaradrone at gmail dot com)

Important NOTE: You will get a Windows Defender warning when you start the exe file. That's simply because the game is not digitally signed by any "trusted authority". There's nothing wrong with it. In case of doubt, let your virus scanner check it before you run it.
